flavorText: For the Gruul, bone-crushing rage is the first priority. Accuracy comes in a distant ninetieth.

foreignData.flavorText: Für die Gruul ist knochenzermalmende Wut erste Priorität. Präzision steht weit abgeschlagen an neunzigster Stelle.
foreignData.name: Gigant aus dem Schorf-Clan
foreignData.text: Wenn der Gigant aus dem Schorf-Clan ins Spiel kommt, kämpft er gegen eine zufällig bestimmte Zielkreatur, die ein Gegner kontrolliert.

foreignData.flavorText: Para los gruul, la furia destructora es la principal prioridad. La precisión ocupa el decimonoveno puesto.
foreignData.name: Gigante del clan Scab
foreignData.text: Cuando el Gigante del clan Scab entre al campo de batalla, lucha contra la criatura objetivo que controle un oponente elegida al azar.

foreignData.flavorText: Chez les Gruul, la rage destructrice est la priorité numéro un. La précision arrive bien loin derrière.
foreignData.name: Géant du clan Psora
foreignData.text: Quand le Géant du clan Psora arrive sur le champ de bataille, il se bat contre une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle choisie au hasard.

foreignData.flavorText: Per i Gruul, la priorità è spaccare ossa. La precisione viene molto, molto dopo.
foreignData.name: Gigante del Clan Scab
foreignData.text: Quando il Gigante del Clan Scab entra nel campo di battaglia, lotta con una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario e scelta a caso.

foreignData.flavorText: グルールにとって一番の重要事項は骨をも砕く憤怒の迸りである。正確性は九十番目といったところだ。
foreignData.name: 瘡蓋族の巨人
foreignData.text: 瘡蓋族の巨人が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手１人がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を無作為に選んで対象とする。瘡蓋族の巨人はそれと格闘を行う。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 巨人・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: 그룰의 우선순위 1위는 강렬함이다. 정확도는 대강 90위쯤 된다.
foreignData.name: 딱지 부족 거인
foreignData.text: 딱지 부족 거인이 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물 한 개를 무작위로 목표로 정한다. 딱지 부족 거인은 그 생물과 싸운다.

foreignData.flavorText: Для Груулов главное в драке — это накал гнева. Направленность этого гнева стоит в списке приоритетов примерно на девяностом месте.
foreignData.name: Гигант из Клана Скаб
foreignData.text: Когда Гигант из Клана Скаб выходит на поле битвы, он дерется со случайно выбранным целевым существом под контролем оппонента.

foreignData.flavorText: 对古鲁而言，滔天怒火才是最重要的事。至于准不准，他可不管。
foreignData.name: 司凯族巨人
foreignData.text: 当司凯族巨人进战场时，随机选择目标由对手操控的生物，它与后者互斗。

foreignData.flavorText: 對古魯而言，滔天怒火才是最重要的事。至於準不準，他可不管。
foreignData.name: 司凱族巨人
foreignData.text: 當司凱族巨人進戰場時，隨機選擇目標由對手操控的生物，它與後者互鬥。

name: Scab-Clan Giant
originalText: When Scab-Clan Giant enters the battlefield, it fights target creature an opponent controls chosen at random.

rulings.text: To choose a target at random, all legal targets must have an equal chance of being chosen. There are many ways to do this, including assigning each possible legal target a number and rolling a die.
The target is chosen at random as part of putting the ability on the stack. Players can respond to the ability knowing what the target of the ability is.

If Scab-Clan Giant leaves the battlefield before its ability resolves, no fight will happen and neither creature will deal damage. Also, if the target creature is an illegal target when the ability tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and no fight will happen.
In a multiplayer game, you don’t choose a single opponent at random. Any creature controlled by any of your opponents may be chosen at random.

text: When Scab-Clan Giant enters the battlefield, it fights target creature an opponent controls chosen at random.
